name: Cajun Cabbage with Rice
author: AVALONFAAYRE
summary: Really good and different casserole dish with a KICK! If you like Cajun, you'll love this recipe! One pan recipe...gotta love it!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can diced tomatoes with mild green chilies, undrained
½ cup long grain rice, uncooked
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat
Brown together the beef, green pepper, onion, and garlic until the meat is no longer pink and the vegetables have softened, about 8 minutes
Stir in tomatoes, tomato sauce, rice, salt, basil, oregano, and the cayenne, white, and black pepper (adding more pepper to taste, if desired)
Spread mixture into an ungreased 9x12-inch baking pan
Top with cabbage and Colby cheese
Cover and bake in preheated oven for 65 to 75 minutes, or until the rice is tender
